tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Twisted Kittens Cluster — The Laws of Survival.</> Welcome to the Ark, survivor. These pages contain the cluster rules, flag system, rates, events, and shop guidance. Suggestions are welcome — your voice matters in the pride.

<TextStyle.Violet>Valguero</> — Rugged mountains, dense forests, treacherous caves, and an underground ocean await. Choose your path: tribe, solo, builder, or explorer.
tab1.text3:
<TextStyle.Green>How to open this UI:</>
PC: Press F1
PS5: Hold Square → highlight the wolf icon → press R2

<TextStyle.Violet>Core Links</>
Discord: dsc.gg/twistedwhiskers
Webshop & Starters: www.twistedkittensgaming.com

<TextStyle.Violet>Common Chat Commands</>
!help — Command list
!balance — Show webshop token balance
!report — Submit admin report
!review — Leave feedback
!dinowipe — Dino wipe schedule
!rules — Display rules
!flag — Flag compliance kit
!die — Kill your survivor
!reset — Teleport to safe location (does not teleport tames)
!discord — Discord invite
!website — Official website
!shop — Admin shop

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Territory & Tribal Claims</>
• Each Tribe may claim two bases per map. Base size must not cause lag or fence large swaths of land.
• Solo players may have one base per map. If a solo joins a tribe, the solo base must be dismantled and merged.
• Claiming more than allowed will result in admin action.
tab2.text2:
<TextStyle.White>Building With Balance</>
• Build freely but keep performance and fairness in mind.
• Mega-base planning requires admin approval before major expansion.
• Do not block: high-resource zones, explorer notes, artifact caves or terminals.
• No structure spam. Taming traps must be cleaned up after use.
tab2.text3:
<TextStyle.White>Code of the Wild</>
• No offline breeding. Imprinting and care matter.
• No egg theft. Respect other survivors’ lineages.
• Harassment is prohibited. Manage tribe disputes privately; admins are not mediators.
tab2.text4:
<TextStyle.White>The Harsh Truth & Discipline</>
• Admins do not replace gameplay losses. Server errors may be remedied via community token compensation in rare cases.
• Abandoned creatures at other bases or obelisks will be wiped without warning.

<TextStyle.Red>Disciplinary Path (Rule of Three)</>
1) First offense: verbal warning + 24h correction notice (Discord).
2) Second offense: involved structures/tames/players may be wiped. Failure to correct after 24h auto-triggers second offense.
3) Third offense (within 30 days): permanent banishment.

Admin support is handled in order received. We are volunteers — please be patient. Supporters who help the community may receive rewards.

tab3.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Flag System Rules</>
The flag system is strictly enforced. Tribes must display the correct flag by the schedule. Any tribe found with an incorrect or outdated flag DURING a wipe will be fully wiped on that map. Items, tames, and bases may be salvaged and auctioned.
tab3.text2:
<TextStyle.Green>Normal Players</>
• Update tribe flag before the end of each month.
• Next required flag color announced one week in advance.
• Failure to update before the first wipe wave = tribe wiped on that map. No compensation.
tab3.text3:
<TextStyle.Green>Subscribed Players</>
• Must change flag every 3 months. Notices will be provided.
• Cancelling subscription moves your tribe to Normal Player schedule.
• If you stop playing and inform admins, your base will be removed; items/tames may be auctioned. Noteworthy bases may be auctioned intact.

<TextStyle.Green>Admins</>
• Admins must also update flags every 3 months. Failure to do so can result in wipe and auction of items/tames or base.
tab3.text4:
<TextStyle.White>Flag Color Decisions (Admins choose colors; no exceptions)</>

<TextStyle.White>Admin Flag (Valid 180 days — Multi-panel)</>
Jan–Jun: Azure / Twilight
Jul–Dec: Blue / Green

<TextStyle.White>Donor Flag (Valid 90 days — Multi-panel)</>
Jan–Mar: Purple / Cyan
Apr–Jun: Magenta / Blue
Jul–Sep: Yellow / Baby Blue
Oct–Dec: Red / Navy Blue

<TextStyle.White>Free-To-Play Flag (Valid 30 days)</>
Jan: Blue
Feb: Pink
Mar: Forest Green
Apr: Brick
May: Royal
Jun: Magenta
Jul: Red
Aug: Olive
Sep: Yellow
Oct: Black
Nov: Orange
Dec: Green

tab4.text1:
<RichColor Color="1,0,0,1">Experience & Progress</>
XP: 1.5x | Alpha Kill XP: 1.33x | Boss XP: 2.5x | Wild Kill XP: 1.25x | Crafting XP: 1.25x

<TextStyle.Green>Taming & Gathering</>
Taming Speed: 5x
Harvest Amount: 2.5x
tab4.text2:
<TextStyle.Green>Player & World Mechanics</>
Water Drain: 0.75x | Food Drain: 0.75x | Health Recovery: 2.5x
Player Resistance: 1.25x | Player Damage: 1.25x
Decay Timer: 3.5x | Structure Resistance: 0x
Time: 24 in-game hours = 120 real minutes
Map location visibility: Enabled
Daily restart: 03:00 EST
tab4.text3:
<TextStyle.Violet>Performance & Optimization</>
For console and low-end PC performance improvements, follow our guide:
https://twistedkittensgaming.premiumark.net/news/92130-commands-to-help-console-and-lower-speedperformance-pcs

<TextStyle.White>Need admin assistance?</>
Admin requests are processed in the order received. Staff are volunteers; see Discord to apply to help or expedite urgent issues.

Full mod lists, change logs and patch notes:
www.twistedkittensgaming.com
Discord: dsc.gg/twistedwhiskers

tab5.text1:
<TextStyle.Orange>Monthly Highlights</>
• Word of the Month: Announced in Discord. Guess the word in global chat to receive free tokens.
• Starter Lotto: Webshop lottery. Prizes up to 1000 tokens. Higher tiers coming soon.
tab5.text2:
<TextStyle.White>Active Activities</>
• Starter Lotto (webshop)
• Community-run builds and events — check Discord for signups and schedules.
tab5.text3:
<TextStyle.Violet>Quests & Submissions</>
Submit quest ideas in Discord under #event-suggestions. Community-approved quests rotate monthly.
tab5.text4:
<TextStyle.Red>Bob Beach Treasure Hunt</>
Five treasure caches spawn per map monthly. Rewards may include tames, building materials, and token consumables.

tab6.text1:
<TextStyle.White>Registered player shops adhere to a code of conduct that protects buyers and ensures quality. Purchase from verified shops for safer trading.</>

<TextStyle.Violet>Sample Verified Shop</>
Shop Name: Dragonstone Egg Emporium
Discord: MalachThor
Owner: Dragon Lord
Map: The Island
Location: 65.6, 31.2 (TP: Dragonstone)
Goods: Tames and Eggs
tab6.text2:
<TextStyle.Green>Marketplace Rules</>
• All tame sales must include a saddle.
• Spayed/neutered tames may not be sold by registered shops.
• Stackable goods should be sold in full stacks when applicable.
• Token transactions are admin-enforceable; verified disputes will be corrected and penalties applied to sellers when warranted.
tab6.text3:
<TextStyle.White>How to Report</>
Report via in-game !report, Discord, or at www.twistedkittensgaming.com. Include:
- Date/time of transaction
- Description of issue (e.g., missing saddle)
- Shop name and location
- Seller survivor name

Admins will investigate and take appropriate action, including refunds or penalties.
